levels.description: Begins cooking and stops attacking for 10 seconds. During cooking, all allied units within range recover HP equal to <@ba.vup>{tick_heal_scale:0%}</> of Senshi's ATK every second. Afterward, heal all allied units within a certain range once for <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> ATK and restore <@ba.vup>{magic_sp:0}</> <$ba.magicpoint>Mana</>
